title: Room full of House Wives ( Kandi Buruss and Porsha Williams)
itunes:title: Room full of House Wives ( Kandi Buruss and Porsha Williams)
description:
Today on the show we had Kandi Buruss from Housewives of Atlanta stop by where she spoke about the reunion, having a surrogate, reuniting with Porsha and more. And speaking of Porsha, we even had her stop by right after, where she spoke about her friendship with Kandi, meeting her husband and more. Also. Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Uber for their recent offensive tweet, that got everyone switching to Lyft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
